articles.description: Major League Soccer today unveiled Sporting Kansas City’s 34-game schedule for the 2022 MLS regular season, which will kick off Sunday, Feb. 27 in Atlanta with the club’s first of 10 nationally-televised regular season matches and will conclude on Sunday, Oct…

articles.title: Charlie Woods' first ever eagle 🔥 - PGA TOUR
articles.description: In the 2020 PNC Championship, Charlie Woods made his first career eagle by hitting an incredible hooking 5-wood at the par-5 3rd hole to within five feet.#Sh...
